column4: I'm currently trying to install a driver through NDISWrapper; the installation guide tells me to run "depmod -a" and make sure it doesn't error. However it gives me a FATAL error, but the documentation doesn't tell me what to do. Any help?
what does depmod -a do?  also, I can give you a different guide...
it doesn't say, it simply tells you to run it and make sure it doesn't error. Any other help would be appreciated.
